CustomField.description: Upload Signed Document button to upload signed document back to the agreement.
CustomField.formula: IF(AND( ISPICKVAL(Apttus__Status_Category__c,"In Signatures"), (ISPICKVAL(Apttus__Status__c,"Other Party Signatures") ) ), IF (OR ($User.UIThemeDisplayed == 'Theme4d', $User.UIThemeDisplayed == 'Theme4t', $User.UIThemeDisplayed == 'Theme4u') , HYPERLINK("/apex/Apttus__LightningOfflineDocumentImport?action=UploadSignedDocument&id=" &Id, IMAGE("/resource/Apttus__Button_UploadSignedDocument", "Upload Signed Document"),"_self" ) , HYPERLINK("/apex/Apttus__OfflineDocumentImport?action=UploadSignedDocument&id=" &Id, IMAGE("/resource/Apttus__Button_UploadSignedDocument", "Upload Signed Document"),"_self") ) ,NULL)
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Upload Signed Document button to upload signed document back to the agreement.
CustomField.label: Upload Signed Document
